Name: Bitter Lady
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: We have dramatically cut the bitter liqueur and lemon in Mickael's original recipe to make a much lighter drink.
History: Adapted from a drink created by Mickael Perron from Bar Now On.
